article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 164 killed overnight in Gaza.
sentence: Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  164  killed  overnight  in  Gaza.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 164 killed overnight in Gaza.
sentence: Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  has  just  issued  its  regular  casualty  update,  which  says  28,340  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  nearly  68,000  wounded  in  the  Strip  since  7  October.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 164 killed overnight in Gaza.
sentence: The  ministry  says  164  have  been  killed  and  200  injured  in  Gaza  over  the  last  day,  although  it  is  not  clear  exactly  how  many  died  in  Israeli  attacks  on  Rafah  overnight.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 164 killed overnight in Gaza.
sentence: We've  had  conflicting  reports  on  this,  with  heath  ministry  spokesman  Ashraf  al-Qudra  saying  67  people  were  killed  in  Rafah.

sentence: But  the  AFP  news  agency,  also  citing  the  ministry,  is  reporting  more  than  100  killed  in  the  city  on  the  border  with  Egypt.

sentence: Israel's  military  launched  its  operations  in  the  Gaza  Strip  after  more  than  1,200  people  were  killed  in  southern  Israel  on  7  October  by  Hamas  gunmen,  who  also  took  253  people  hostage.
